name: ocr-microservice
description: Node.js microservice for running Tesseract OCR

scripts.build-docker: docker build --rm -f Dockerfile.build -t sethfsamuel/ocr-microservice-build . && docker run --rm -it -v "$(PWD)":/app sethfsamuel/ocr-microservice-build && docker build --rm -t sethfsamuel/ocr-microservice .
